title: Relates to the use of eminent domain
summary: Establishes eminent domain shall only be used for public projects; establishes after any industrial development agency approves the use of eminent domain, the county legislature or the New York city council shall vote to determine whether or not to condemn such property; establishes a condemnor shall reimburse a condemnee any relocation costs.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the eminent domain procedure law, in relation to the use of eminent domain
